Uses of Class
actions.Action

Packages that use Action
actions   
controllers   
 

Uses of Action in actions
 

Subclasses of Action in actions
 class AddUserAction
          An AddUserAction adds a new set of user credentials to the bulletin board.
 class CommandsAction
          A Commands action simply provides all available commands to the user.
 class CreateAction
          A Create action creates a new topic.
 class DeleteMessageAction
          A DeleteMessage action deletes a message by index..
 class DeleteTopicAction
          A Delete Topic action removes a topic from the bulletin board.
 class ListUsersAction
          A ListUsersAction returns a list of all currently logged in users.
 class LoginAction
          A LoginAction attempts to login with a username, password combo
 class LogoutAction
          A logout action logs out a currently logged in user.
 class PostAction
          A Post action attempts to create a post from the current user to the currently selected message board.
 class ReadAction
          A read action returns a complete list of all posts in a topic.
 class SetAction
          A set action sets the currently selected topic.
 class TopicsAction
          A TopicsAction returns a list of all topics on the Bulletin board.
 

Uses of Action in controllers
 

Methods in controllers that return Action
static Action Actionfactory.createAction(java.lang.String request)
          Creates a new action of the appropriate type, or throws an error.
